name: Blocky's Block Quest
description:
Set out on a quest through 10 levels of platforming, precision and good timing.

Blocky's Block Quest is my first actually complete Clickteam game. It's a classic platformer game with 10 levels, and more to come in the future possibly!

The full version is out! The game now saves your progress

Hope you enjoy it.

#platformer #retro #classic #other #puzzle #arcade #survival
